explanation: [0-0] In a gym, a black man in a blue shirt and black pants is working out on gym equipment. A blonde woman in a blue shirt and dark blue pants is walking towards him. Behind them, another person in orange is working out. There is a lot of gym equipment around.

[0-6] As the blonde woman walks up to the black man, she notices a cell phone on the floor. When the blonde woman bends down to pick it up, the black man also notices the phone. He squats down and picks up the phone while blocking the blonde woman. The camera zooms in as the black man puts the phone in his pocket. The camera then zooms out as the black man stands up and pretends that nothing happened. The blonde woman gives him a helpless look.
